name: BitMech Demo
description:
Bitmech is a game that allows the player to design their own transforming mech, which they will eventually use to fight hordes of enemies and advance across a massive battlefield. For now this demo only contains the loading of custom assets, as well as some basic terrain, weapons, and enemies (that don't even have AI currently). 

"redcar.zip" can be un-zipped and placed into the file directory "%appdata%/local/BitMech_proper ". The Demo currently looks for a folder named "redcar", and upon finding it will load the contained assets. To be clear, you design the mech's visuals by editing the files contained within "redcar". In-game, you can customize a weapon loadout. I look forwards to seeing where this whole thing goes!

================================

Basic Controls

Vehicle mode:

WASD - Move

space - Boost

t - transform to mech

Mech mode:

WASD - move

space - Jump

t - transform to land vehicle

N - fire right hand weapon

M - fire left hand weapon

Developer Controls (will be removed in actual game)

Left shift + 1 - swap left hand weapon to repeater

Left shift + 2 - swap left hand weapon to Chainsaw

Left shift + Q - Create Enemy Mech on cursor

Left shift + E - Toggle control of enemy Mech nearest to cursor

Right shift + 1 - swap Right hand weapon to repeater

Right shift + 2 - swap Right hand weapon to Chainsaw

Right shift + Q - Decrease player jump height

Right shift + E - Increase player jump height (can land on buildings)
